# awesome-checkbox



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                             | Type      | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `checked`  | `checked`  | If `true`, the checkbox is checked. Default to `false`; | `boolean` | `false` |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | The flag of disabling the checkbox. Default to `false`. | `boolean` | `false` |


## Events

| Event           | Description                    | Type                                                    |
| --------------- | ------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------- |
| `awesomeChange` | Event of status being changed. | `CustomEvent<{ checked: boolean; innerEvent: Event; }>` |
